1309120.name: Masters of Puzzle - In Serenity
1309120.description:
In Serenity is the third wonderful illustration from the German artist, Christian Hecker, in the collection Terran Utopia. We hope you will enjoy the new and fresh art of Christian as well as the enchanting vision of his illustrations.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in HD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. The illustration is a combination of many distinct details with several areas that need careful examination. It should provide a good challenge for the majority of the players.

If you like the art, make sure to check the other puzzle boxes in the collection Terran Utopia. You won't be disappointed.
1309120.supported_languages: 英语, 保加利亚语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
